span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message and inner exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會使用`message`參數來初始化屬性並`innerException`參數來初始化屬性。This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the property and the `innerException` parameter to initialize the property. 如果`innerException`不是`null`，處理的 catch 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況`innerException`。If `innerException` is not `null`, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles `innerException`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor.
